3 LccpSegmentationAlgorithm::LccpSegmentationAlgorithm(ros::NodeHandle* handle, const Parameters& param, std::string name):
4  nh_(*handle), service_name_(name){
5  ROS_INFO("Segmentation service started");
6  this->param_.zmin = param.zmin;
7  this->param_.zmax = param.zmax;
8  this->param_.th_points = param.th_points;
9  this->param_.disable_transform = param.disable_transform;
10  this->param_.voxel_resolution = param.voxel_resolution;
11  this->param_.seed_resolution = param.seed_resolution;
12  this->param_.color_importance = param.color_importance;
13  this->param_.spatial_importance = param.spatial_importance;
14  this->param_.normal_importance = param.normal_importance;
15  this->param_.concavity_tolerance_threshold = param.concavity_tolerance_threshold;
16  this->param_.smoothness_threshold = param.smoothness_threshold;
17  this->param_.min_segment_size = param.min_segment_size;
18  this->param_.use_extended_convexity = param.use_extended_convexity;
19  this->param_.use_sanity_criterion = param.use_sanity_criterion;
20  segmentation_server_ = nh_.advertiseService(service_name_, &LccpSegmentationAlgorithm::segmentationCallback,
21  this);
22 }
23 
24 bool LccpSegmentationAlgorithm::segmentationCallback(segmentation_lccp::segmentation::Request &req,
25  segmentation_lccp::segmentation::Response &res){
26  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
27  pcl::fromROSMsg(req.input_cloud, *cloud);
28  std::unique_ptr<lccp_segmentation> seg(new lccp_segmentation);
29  seg->init(*cloud, this->param_);
30  std::vector<Object> seg_objs;
31  seg->segment();
32  seg_objs = seg->get_segmented_objects();
33 
34  //Table cloud
35  CloudPtr table_cloud = seg->get_plane_cloud();
36  for(uint i = 0; i < table_cloud->points.size(); ++i){
37  table_cloud->at(i).r = 0;
38  table_cloud->at(i).g = 255;
39  table_cloud->at(i).b = 0;
40  table_cloud->at(i).a = 255;
41  }
42  pcl::toROSMsg(*table_cloud, res.plane_cloud);
43 
44  //Object clouds
45  for(uint i=0;i<seg_objs.size();++i){
46  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 obj_msg;
47  pcl::toROSMsg(seg_objs[i].obj_cloud, obj_msg);
48  obj_msg.header.seq = i;
49  obj_msg.header.frame_id = req.input_cloud.header.frame_id;
50  obj_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
51  res.object_cloud.push_back(obj_msg);
52  }
53  return true;
54 }

lccp_segmentation
Class to detect table top objects in a cluttered scene segmenting the point cloud. Algorithm is based on http://docs.pointclouds.org/trunk/classpcl_1_1_l_c_c_p_segmentation.html.
